about_the_game:
GRIND×GRIND is an exhilarating shooter that combines dynamic gameplay with upgrade elements. As the main character Hiro, who has been transformed into a gelatinous slime in a fantastical world, players will face a myriad of unique enemies and challenging situations.

The game features several types of weapons, each offering unique advantages in combat. Players can utilize powerful weaponry that pierces through multiple enemies in its path, or weapons that ricochet off foes, dealing damage to several opponents at once. Additionally, there are strong melee attacks for close combat. The convenient automatic attack mechanics allow players to focus on aiming accuracy.

Players can upgrade each weapon by earning gold coins in combat. The open global map showcases six unique battle arenas, each filled with a variety of enemies and challenges. Besides the arenas, there are shops on the map where players can enhance their weapons and tailor them to their playstyle.

In the storyline, Hiro must collect 1,000,000 coins in order to return to his human form with the help of the mysterious elf Lyra. Dive into the world of GRIND×GRIND and showcase your skills to overcome all obstacles on your journey back to the life you desire!

Features:

Hand-Drawn Art: Unique visuals crafted by a skilled artist.
Arena Shooter: Fast-paced battles in six distinct arenas.
Diverse Weapons: Piercing, ricocheting, and melee options.
Automatic Attack: Focus on aiming while attacks are automated.
Weapon Upgrades: Earn coins to upgrade and customize weapons.
Open Global Map: Explore arenas and visit shops for enhancements.
Compelling Story: Help Hiro collect 1,000,000 coins to regain his human form.
Challenging Enemies: Face diverse foes with unique attack patterns.
Replayability: Experiment with weapon builds for endless variety.
